message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000.
Thanks for your interest, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but the value of this product is significant, and $13,500 is my best offer at this time.
I'm still interested in the product, but I can only go up to $12,750.
